__SqlaTable__.sql:
with rollday as
     (select distinct now()::Date - (7*(ceiling((now()::date - dd.date::date)::numeric / 7.00)))::integer + 6 as rollingweekend
      from common.datedimension dd
      where ceiling((now()::date - dd.date::date)::numeric / 7.00) between 1 and 5 ) select slm.loaddate,
                                                                                            count(distinct skuid) total_sku
   from demandai.sku_loc_metadata_historical slm
   JOIN rollday dd ON slm.loaddate::date = dd.rollingweekend
   where skustatus = true
     and ispeakrowdelete is null
   group by slm.loaddate

select count(distinct skuid) from demandai.mvw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg >=10

select coalesce(sum((minstocklevel - currentstock)*lastknownrrp), 0) as salesatrisk
   from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
   where demanddate = now()::Date-1
     and currentstock < minstocklevel

select coalesce(sum(forecastsalesamt),0) as sum from demandai.mvw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg <= (-10)

with rollday as
     (select distinct now()::Date - (7*(ceiling((now()::date - dd.date::date)::numeric / 7.00)))::integer + 6 as rollingweekend
      from common.datedimension dd
      where ceiling((now()::date - dd.date::date)::numeric / 7.00) between 1 and 5 ) select slm.loaddate,
                                                                                            sum ((case
                                                                                                      when sd.costofgoods is null then
                                                                                                             (select costofgoods
                                                                                                              from demandai.sku_loc_demand
                                                                                                              where skuid = slm.skuid
                                                                                                                and locationid = slm.locationid
                                                                                                                and demanddate =
                                                                                                                  (select max(demanddate)
                                                                                                                   from demandai.sku_loc_demand
                                                                                                                   where skuid = slm.skuid
                                                                                                                     and locationid = slm.locationid
                                                                                                                     and slm.loaddate > demanddate
                                                                                                                     and ispeakrowdelete is null ) )
                                                                                                      else costofgoods
                                                                                                  end) * (case
                                                                                                              when sd.currentstock is null then
                                                                                                                     (select currentstock
                                                                                                                      from demandai.sku_loc_demand
                                                                                                                      where skuid = slm.skuid
                                                                                                                        and locationid = slm.locationid
                                                                                                                        and demanddate =
                                                                                                                          (select max(demanddate)
                                                                                                                           from demandai.sku_loc_demand
                                                                                                                           where skuid = slm.skuid
                                                                                                                             and locationid = slm.locationid
                                                                                                                             and slm.loaddate > demanddate
                                                                                                                             and ispeakrowdelete is null ) )
                                                                                                              else currentstock
                                                                                                          end))
   from demandai.sku_loc_metadata_historical slm
   left join demandai.sku_loc_demand sd on slm.skuid = sd.skuid
   and slm.locationid = sd.locationid
   and slm.loaddate = sd.demanddate
   JOIN rollday dd ON slm.loaddate::date = dd.rollingweekend
   where slm.skustatus = true
     and slm.ispeakrowdelete is null
     and sd.ispeakrowdelete is null
   group by slm.loaddate

select coalesce(sum(demand * lastknownrrp),0) currweeksales
 from  demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
 where 
 staticweekno = 0

select coalesce(sum((currentstock - maxstocklevel)*costofgoods), 0) as capitalatrisk
   from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
   where demanddate = now()::Date-1
     and currentstock > maxstocklevel

select staticweekno,weekstart::date,weekend::date,sum(wg1.demand * wg1.lastknownrrp) totalsalesamt
from 
demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek wg1
where 
staticweekno between 1 and 4
group by staticweekno,weekstart,weekend

select count(distinct skuid) understocksku 
from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
demanddate = now()::Date-1
and currentstock < minstocklevel

with 
datestatcategory as (
select 
distinct  
("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) as staticweekno  ,
dd.weekstart,
to_date(right(dd.weekrange,'10'),'dd-mm-yyyy') AS weekend,ct.category
from 
 common.datedimension dd , (select categorywise as category from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4category ) as ct
 where 
  ("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) between -5 and 2
  and ct.category <> ''
)
select dtc.category,coalesce(sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp),0) forecastsale,dtc.weekstart as weekend,dtc.staticweekno
from 
datestatcategory dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek sf on dtc.staticweekno = sf.staticweekno and dtc.weekstart = sf.weekstart  and dtc.category = sf.category
where 
dtc.category in (select categorywise from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4category  )
and dtc.staticweekno between 0 and 1
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.category
union all
select 
dtc.category,coalesce(sum(demand * lastknownrrp),0) totalsales,dtc.weekstart,dtc.staticweekno
FROM 
datestatcategory dtc 
left join 
demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek sf on dtc.staticweekno = -(sf.staticweekno) and dtc.weekstart = sf.weekstart and dtc.category = sf.category
where 
 dtc.staticweekno between -4 and -1
and dtc.category in (select categorywise from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4category)
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.category

select coalesce(sum(forecastsalesamt),0) as sum from demandai.mvw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg >=10

select count(distinct skuid) overstocksku 
from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
currentstock > maxstocklevel 
and demanddate = now()::Date-1

with postcode_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart::date,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,postcode
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and postcode <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,postcode
)
,
top5loc as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,postcode,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,postcode,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  postcode_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
),
city_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,city
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and city <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,city
)
,
top5loc_city as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,city,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,city,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  city_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
state_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,state
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and state <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,state
)
,
top5loc_state as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,state,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,state,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  state_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
county_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,county
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and county <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,county
)
,
top5loc_county as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,county,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,county,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  county_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
country_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,country
from 
demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and country <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,country
)
,
top5loc_country as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,country,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,country,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  country_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
datestatpostcode as (
select 
distinct  
("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) as staticweekno  ,
dd.weekstart,
to_date(right(dd.weekrange,'10'),'dd-mm-yyyy') AS weekend,ct.postcode
from 
 common.datedimension dd , (select postcode from top5loc) as ct
 where 
  ("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) between -5 and 2
and ct.postcode <> ''
  )
,
datestatcity as (
select 
distinct  
("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) as staticweekno  ,
dd.weekstart,
to_date(right(dd.weekrange,'10'),'dd-mm-yyyy') AS weekend,ct.city
from 
 common.datedimension dd , (select city from top5loc_city) as ct
 where 
  ("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) between -5 and 2
and ct.city <> ''
  )
,
datestatcounty as (
select 
distinct  
("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) as staticweekno  ,
dd.weekstart,
to_date(right(dd.weekrange,'10'),'dd-mm-yyyy') AS weekend,ct.county
from 
 common.datedimension dd , (select county from top5loc_county) as ct
 where 
  ("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) between -5 and 2
and ct.county <> ''
  )
,
datestatstate as (
select 
distinct  
("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) as staticweekno  ,
dd.weekstart,
to_date(right(dd.weekrange,'10'),'dd-mm-yyyy') AS weekend,ct.state
from 
 common.datedimension dd , (select state from top5loc_state) as ct
 where 
  ("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) between -5 and 2
and ct.state <> ''
  )
,
datestatcountry as (
select 
distinct  
("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) as staticweekno  ,
dd.weekstart,
to_date(right(dd.weekrange,'10'),'dd-mm-yyyy') AS weekend,ct.country
from 
 common.datedimension dd , (select country from top5loc_country) as ct
 where 
  ("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) between -5 and 2
  and ct.country <> ''
  )
,
locdata as (
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.postcode as location,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0)  ,'postcode' as type
from
datestatpostcode dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = -(cd.staticweekno) and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart and dtc.postcode = cd.postcode
where 
dtc.postcode in (select postcode from top5loc)
and dtc.staticweekno between -4 and 0
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.postcode
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.city as location,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) salesamt ,'city' as type
from
datestatcity dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = -(cd.staticweekno) and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart and dtc.city = cd.city
where 
dtc.city in (select city from top5loc_city)
and dtc.staticweekno between -4 and 0
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.city
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.state as location,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) salesamt ,'state' as type
from
datestatstate dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = -(cd.staticweekno) and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart and dtc.state = cd.state
where 
dtc.state in (select state from top5loc_state)
and dtc.staticweekno between -4 and 0
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.state
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.county as location,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) salesamt ,'county' as type
from
datestatcounty dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = -(cd.staticweekno) and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart  and dtc.county = cd.county
where 
dtc.county in (select county from top5loc_county)
and dtc.staticweekno between -4 and 0
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.county
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.country as location,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) salesamt ,'country' as type
from
datestatcountry dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_demandsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = -(cd.staticweekno) and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart and dtc.country = cd.country
where 
dtc.country in (select country from top5loc_country)
and dtc.staticweekno between -4 and 0
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.country
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.postcode as location,coalesce(sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'postcode' as type
from 
datestatpostcode dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = cd.staticweekno and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart  and dtc.postcode = cd.postcode
where 
dtc.postcode <> ''
and dtc.postcode in (select postcode from top5loc)
and dtc.staticweekno between 0 and 1
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.postcode
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.city as location,coalesce(sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'city' as type
from 
datestatcity dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = cd.staticweekno and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart  and dtc.city = cd.city
where 
dtc.city <> ''
and dtc.city in (select city from top5loc_city)
and dtc.staticweekno between 0 and 1
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.city
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.state as location,coalesce(sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'state' as type
from 
datestatstate dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = cd.staticweekno and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart  and dtc.state = cd.state
where 
dtc.state <> ''
and dtc.state in (select state from top5loc_state)
and dtc.staticweekno between 0 and 1
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.state
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.county as location,coalesce(sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'county' as type
from 
datestatcounty dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = cd.staticweekno and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart  and dtc.county = cd.county
where 
dtc.county <> ''
and dtc.county in (select county from top5loc_county)
and dtc.staticweekno between 0 and 1
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.county
union all
select dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.country as location,coalesce(sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp),0) totalsale,'country' as type
from 
datestatcountry dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_locwise_forecastsales cd  on dtc.staticweekno = cd.staticweekno and dtc.weekstart = cd.weekstart  and dtc.country = cd.country
where 
dtc.country <> ''
and dtc.country in (select country from top5loc_country)
and dtc.staticweekno between 0 and 1
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekend,dtc.country
)
select * from locdata

select count(distinct skuid) from demandai.mvw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg <= (-10)

select 'Revenue Profile SKU Units' as profile,
          peakcategory1 as peak_category,
          coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory1
   union select 'Demand Profile SKU Units' as profile,
                peakcategory2,
                coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory2
   union select 'Demand Profile SKU Units' as profile,
                peakcategory3,
                coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory3
   union select 'Demand Profile SKU Units'  as profile,
                peakcategory4,
                coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory4
   union select 'Demand Profile SKU Units' as profile,
                peakcategory5,
                coalesce(count(DISTINCT skuid), 0) totaluniqueskuid
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno = 1
   group by peakcategory5

with 
datestatbrand as (
select 
distinct  
("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) as staticweekno  ,
dd.weekstart,
to_date(right(dd.weekrange,'10'),'dd-mm-yyyy') AS weekend,ct.brand 
from 
 common.datedimension dd , (select brandwise as brand  from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4brand ) as ct
 where 
  ("substring"(dd.weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer - (select "substring"(weekrange::text, 1, 4)::integer from common.datedimension where date = now()::Date)) between -5 and 2
  and ct.brand <> ''
)
select dtc.brand,coalesce(sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp),0) forecastsale ,dtc.weekstart as weekend,dtc.staticweekno
from 
datestatbrand dtc 
left join demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek sf on dtc.staticweekno = sf.staticweekno and dtc.weekstart = sf.weekstart  and dtc.brand = sf.brand
where 
dtc.staticweekno between 0 and 1
and dtc.brand in (select brandwise from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4brand  )
group by dtc.staticweekno,dtc.weekstart,dtc.brand
union all
select dtc.brand as brandwise,coalesce(sum(demand*lastknownrrp),0) totalsales,dtc.weekstart,dtc.staticweekno
FROM 
datestatbrand dtc 
left join 
demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek sd  on dtc.staticweekno = -(sd.staticweekno) and dtc.weekstart = sd.weekstart and dtc.brand = sd.brand
where 
 dtc.staticweekno between -4 and -1
and dtc.brand in (select brandwise from demandai.mvw_lastweektop4brand)
group by dtc.brand,dtc.weekstart,dtc.staticweekno

select weekend::date,
          coalesce(sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp), 0) totalforecastamount
   from demandai.mvw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
   where staticweekno in (0,
                          1)
   group by weekend
   union select weekstart,
                coalesce(sum(wg1.demand * wg1.lastknownrrp), 0) totalsalesamt
   from demandai.mvw_weekly_demand_staticweek wg1
   where staticweekno between 1 and 4
   group by weekstart
   order by 1
__SqlaTable__.table_name: admin admin-Query demandai.Predictive Next Week Sales-cnXWMdYC8
